messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a pack of energy draining parasites have stampeded into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I got a call from this station about needing help?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Machine Learning Alert

Rampant brand intelligence has been detected aboard Space Station 13. Please stand by. The origin is believed to be a Solar's Best Hot Drinks.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
